amendment.description: To provide for enhanced Federal, State, and local enforcement of the immigration laws.

action.text: Amendment SA 3871 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3871.
Amendment SA 3871 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S10239-10242; text: CR S10240-10241) To provide for enhanced Federal, State, and local enforcement of the immigration laws.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3871 proposed by Senator Sessions.
